Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hostellerie Les Frênes in Avignon (Montfavet), you'll be convenient to Chateaublanc Golf and Grand Avignon Golf. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Chateau de Fargues and Eglise du Pontet.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 18 air-conditioned rooms featuring private spa tubs. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and minibars.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take time to pamper yourself with a visit to the full-service spa. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and a fitness center. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar and a garden view. You can also stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Free self parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 4 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar and a garden view. You can also stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Chateaublanc Golf - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Grand Avignon Golf - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Chateau de Fargues - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Eglise du Pontet - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Parc des Expositions - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
Rocher des Doms - 6 km / 3.7 mi
Avignon Cathedral - 6 km / 3.7 mi
Place de l'Horloge - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi
Palais des Papes - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi
Collection Lambert - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi
Musee du Petit Palais - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi
Pont d'Avignon - 6.2 km / 3.8 mi
Musee Calvet - 6.2 km / 3.9 mi
Tour Philippe le Bel - 7 km / 4.3 mi
Fort St-Andre - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi

The nearest airports are:
Avignon (AVN-Caumont) - 3.8 km / 2.4 mi
Avignon (XZN-Avignon TGV Train Station) - 7.7 km / 4.8 mi

The preferred airport for Hostellerie Les Frênes is Avignon (AVN-Caumont).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Hostellerie les Frenes is Avignon (AVN-Caumont) - 3.8 km / 2.4 mi.
